overview:
Larry Tey is a businessman turn technology investor in Internet companies since 1997. In 2008, he founded private equity firm Global Capital Limited to focus on emerging markets especially Asia Pacific with special interest in technology and energy companies.

Today Global Capital built a portfolio of close to $3 billion assets with investments in telecommunication, Internet & social media, oil & gas, commodity, energy and property businesses. Some of Global Capital technology investments include Inovisi Infracom, a telecommunication and e-commerce company, Goldchild, an integrated natural resource company, Ozura World, one of the world largest mobile Internet social network, and Mobgold, a leading mobile advertising network.

He obtained his Bachelor of Commerce degree, majoring in Business Administration and Finance from the University of Manitoba, Canada in 1998.
